title: How do ranks get placed after 3v3 twisted treeline placements finish
body: Me and my friend both played all 10 games of placements together, in at least 8 of them i did better than him. We won 6 lost 4 and I got placed bronze 1 and he got placed silver 4. Neither of us have done 3v3 placements before so can someone explain why he got a higher rank.

replies.body:
Given that Riot's calculations are hidden it could be a few different things. As far as I know though your initial TT ranked mmr is tied in some way to your SR ranked mmr as a starting point instead of starting with fresh mmr since the queue isn't up much.

I got placed into G5 in TT with average win loss which makes sense from my SR rank but not from a fresh ranked (Silver 3-4).
